articles.description: Mitchell Marsh scored 75 and picked up three wickets as Australia defeated West Indies by four runs in the fourth Twenty20 international
articles.content: Mitchell Marsh produced his career-best T20 international batting and bowling figures to help Australia to a drought-breaking four-run win over the West Indies in the fourth T20 cricket international… [+1969 chars]

articles.title: British and Irish Lions suffer first tour loss against test-strength South Africa A side - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: A powerful team packed with 11 members of the World Cup-winning Springboks proves too strong for the tourists, despite an improved second half display.
articles.content:
A South Africa A team that started with 11 World Cup-winning Springboks beat the British and Irish Lions 17-13 on Wednesday to hand the touring team their first defeat.
 South Africa A led 17-3 at C… [+4498 chars]
